ValidationRule.description: Make the Sales Review field mandatory for theater = AMER
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Request_Quote', OR(NOT( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) ),ISNEW()), ISBLANK(TEXT(Sales_Review__c)), Region_Theatre__c = 'AMERICAS', $User.Username <> $Label.Admin_Salesforce_Username, OR(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate) >= DATEVALUE ( $Label.Request_Quote_Created_Date ),ISNEW()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a value for Sales Review.
